Pack Hunter.name: Pack Hunter
Pack Hunter.description:
The Hyena is a pack hunter, relying on its allies to flank and harrass a target to render it exposed to further harm.

This creature adds one additional Boon to all melee attacks against a target that is Flanked.

Tusk Charge.name: Tusk Charge
Tusk Charge.description: The Boar lowers its head and charges with frantic speed, it's tusks protruding from beneath a drooling gullet.
